## bibliographic information is in the _quarto.yml for the project ##

# I use the abstact-section extension to write abstracts as a normal section
# of the document. If you prefer to write abstracts in yaml, you can comment
# out the filter and uncomment the abstract line.
#abstract: An Abstract
filters:
  - abstract-section

# default formats
# I use a custom aog-article-pdf available as an extension, but this can be 
# replaced with the default pdf format. The submittable extenstion
# also gives me submittable-pdf and submittable-docx for journal submission
# entries, but I leave those commented out until I need them.
format:
  aog-article-pdf:
    keep-tex: false

  #  keep-tex: false
  #submittable-pdf:
  #  keep-tex: false
  #  titlepage: true
  #  endnotes: false
